item.title: Positive Pressure Relief Valves – One Valve Inoperative

placard.para: Placard adjacent to CABIN ALTITUDE CONTROL "ONE POS PRESS RELIEF VALVE INOP" and enter item in Aircraft Deferred Item Log.

numlitem.para: For one failed valve, press flapper doors closed until flush with fuselage.
Disconnect and cap external static sense line from primary differential pressure control mechanism.
Disconnect and cap integral static sense line from secondary differential pressure control mechanism.
